description_for_human: An OpenAI-compatible relay that mirrors the Responses, Models, Files, Vector Stores, and Realtime APIs â€” including tool execution, file handling, and streaming responses.
description_for_model: Use this API to generate responses, create embeddings, upload files, interact with vector stores, and handle realtime sessions. The relay behaves identically to the OpenAI API but runs on a self-hosted Render instance.
